mindfulness.description: Mindfulness is the practice of focusing one's attention on the present moment and accepting it without judgment. It can help reduce stress and improve overall well-being.

techniques.name: Breathing exercises
techniques.description: Focus on your breath, inhaling and exhaling slowly and deeply.

techniques.name: Body scan
techniques.description: Scan your body from head to toe, noting any sensations without judgment.

techniques.name: Mindful walking
techniques.description: Pay attention to each step, feeling the ground beneath your feet.

yoga.description: Yoga is a mind and body practice that combines physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation or relaxation. It can improve both physical and mental health.

styles.name: Hatha
styles.description: Focuses on basic poses and breathing exercises, great for beginners.

styles.name: Vinyasa
styles.description: Emphasizes flowing movements and synchronizing breath with poses, good for building heat in the body.

styles.name: Yin
styles.description: Involves holding poses for longer periods to stretch the connective tissues, promoting relaxation.

other_topics.name: Coping strategies
other_topics.description: Coping strategies are techniques or actions that individuals use to manage stress, emotions, or difficult situations. These strategies can include activities such as deep breathing, talking to a friend or therapist, engaging in hobbies, or practicing mindfulness.

other_topics.name: Stress management techniques
other_topics.description: Stress management techniques are methods used to reduce or cope with stress. This can include practices such as exercise, meditation, yoga, or engaging in relaxing activities.

other_topics.name: Self-care practices
other_topics.description: Self-care practices are activities that individuals engage in to take care of their physical, mental, and emotional well-being. This can include activities such as getting enough sleep, eating nutritious foods, exercising regularly, and setting boundaries in relationships.
